document_data.name: Venna Alumar
document_data.mainbody: '''Venna Alumar''' was a waitress and bartender who worked for [[Darwell Kiriag]] at his establishment, [[the Lonesome Tankard Inn and Tavern]] in the town of [[Eveningstar]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: Venna was a young [[human]] woman with a pale skin tone, dark blue eyes, and long black hair gathered in braids. She wore simple barmaid's garb with [[sandal]]s.
document_data.History: In the mid-1480s DR, Venna could be seen welcoming guests and [[adventurer]]s at the Lonesome Tankard and plying them with food and drink, whether they were dealing with the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] or going elsewhere in the region like the [[Haunted Halls]].
